Hi everyone,
Currently I am implementing the HubSpot quote apis in my website. So just want to know is there any api to update the quote status from `Waiting for payment` to `paid` ?

Are you trying to pull every task or a filtered version of the tasks? if you're trying to pull every task you can just use the tasks endpoint and use the association parameter like you just mentioned. If you're trying to get a filtered version then yes unfortunately you'll need to use a separate api call. One thing to mention though is that if you have CMS pro or Enterpise you can use graphql and make this 1 call instead of 1 call and then 1 more call for each task returned

Yeah if I’m understanding your response correctly, I’m attempting to retrieve tasks that follow a certain filter, instead of simply all my tasks (hence I’m calling POST /tasks/search instead of GET /tasks). 

Thanks for the response

<@U01QVR44MEY> what's the most efficient way to get the contact associations after the filter, assuming that I can't use graphQL? Batch reading the tasks based on taskId doesn't allow you to get the associations as well, so seems like the only way is to fetch each task one-by-one
